actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, to prohibit recipients of assistance under that Act from requiring reduced fare elderly passengers to execute waivers, and to require that elderly reduced fare ridership be afforded on a reciprocal basis.

summary.text: Amends the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964 to prohibit recepients of assistance under such Act from requiring reduced fare elderly passengers to waive, limit, or qualify any benefit, right, or privilege as a condition to such reduced fare. Requires each applicant for assistance under such Act to comply with regulations issued by the Secretary of Transportation to afford all elderly persons reduced fare ridership without regard to place of residence or domicile.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Urban Mass Transportation Act of 1964, to prohibit recipients of assistance under that Act from requiring reduced fare elderly passengers to execute waivers, and to require that elderly reduced fare ridership be afforded on a reciprocal basis.
